name: 13th Apostle Accommodation
description:
The 13th Apostle Accommodation is situated just five-minutes' drive from the world famous 12 Apostles, so is your perfect home-away-from-home to explore the Great Ocean Road.

Set-amongst beautiful bushland, every guest room has private access to large balcony with views across to the incredible sand dunes. You can hear the ocean and taste the salty sea air from the moment you arrive.
The accommodation’s bright and clean rooms feature new inner-spring mattresses, in a 14-person petition-style dorm configuration, or four-person dorm-style options. They also have private rooms, sleeping up to three people.
With newly renovated male and female bathrooms and a comfortable common-room and a common kitchen
fully-equipped kitchen and dining area, with an outdoor kitchen also available.
Perfectly situated just off the Great Ocean Road -only minutes from the 12 Apostles, Gibson’s Steps, Loch Ard Gorge, Gellibrand River, The Great Ocean Walk, and walking distance to view wild Kangaroos, ideally located for all of your Great Ocean Road adventures.

With off-site parking available, and 24-hour contact, they look forward to welcoming you into the modern and vibrant accommodation.
The 13th Apostle Backpackers is located 2.5 hours drive from Melbourne (via inland route), or four hours drive from Melbourne via the Great Ocean Road.

Terms and Conditions Payment Policy
Balance of booking total is due on arrival
Cancellation Policy
All cancellations must be 24 Hours prior to check in or charges will apply (amount up to first nights stay)
No shows are subject to charge up to the amount of first night's stay

Check-in
14:00 - 22:30

Check-out
08:30 - 10:00
